forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.shortForecast: Sunny then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 1pm and 2pm, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Sunny, with a high near 87. West wind 3 to 9 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 10pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 65. West northwest wind 3 to 8 mph. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
